title: Interview: ODD FUTURE – Narduwuar
body:
![](http://latimesblogs.latimes.com/.a/6a00d8341c630a53ef014e86da912c970d-600wi "oddfuture ")

As **SXSW** drew to a close a few more interviews have surfaced of the fascinating ‘**ODD FUTURE**’. Before this, although we’ve been given a lot of material, they’ve been fairly illustrious in terms of their personalities and what makes them tick. So far the most stimulating interview has been done by the ever so eccentric Canadian, ‘**Narduwuar The Human Serviette**’. Expect absurdity and discussions about **Justin Bieber**. Check it out bellow. SWAG.
